messages.title: A General Election will be held on December 12th.
messages.content: When that election comes, every vote for the SNP will make sure Westminster can’t ignore the right of the people of Scotland to determine our own future. I write to ask for your support to ensure that Glasgow Central continues to have an experienced campaigner who will fight for you in Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I have taken on over fifteen thousand constituent cases since becoming an MP in 2015.
Ensured that over £75,000 in underpaid social security has gone into the pockets of those who need it the most in the last year alone.

issues.socialWelfare: Ensured that over £75,000 in underpaid social security has gone into the pockets of those who need it the most in the last year alone.

community.content: I've consistently voted against a damaging no deal Brexit, which would wreck jobs and living standards in Glasgow.

politicalExperience.achievements: Taken on over fifteen thousand constituent cases.

contactInformation.address: Glasgow Central SNP, 68 St Vincent Terrace, Glasgow G3 8DX

quotes.text: The numbers speak for themselves. Since I became your MP in 2015, I have taken on over fifteen thousand constituent cases. In the last year alone, I’ve ensured that over £75,000 in underpaid social security has gone into the pockets of those who need it the most.

examples: Since I became your MP in 2015, I have taken on over fifteen thousand constituent cases.

every vote for the SNP will make sure Westminster can’t ignore the right of the people of Scotland to determine our own future
I've consistently voted against a damaging no deal Brexit, which would wreck jobs and living standards in Glasgow
I have taken the Home Office to task over their cruel hostile environment policies
wreck jobs and living standards in Glasgow.

personalStories.story: I have taken the Home Office to task over their cruel hostile environment policies, fighting for vulnerable people threatened with eviction and deportation and opposed the DWP’s cruel and pernicious two child limit and rape clause.
